name: Perfect Machine
description: Participants design a robot which is made to complete some specified tasks

name: Wright Flight
description: Participants take part with their own designed gliders completing the specified tasks within the stipulated time.

name: Proteus
description: Competition involving the underwater robotics in which participants take part with their own designed bots

name: Robowars
description: Robots fight to beat each other.

name: Velocity
description: It is the flagship event of Engineer involving the RC car racing with self designed cars.
